attributes.action: In the budget we were asked to contribute more in stealth taxes ,No  thank you
attributes.additional_details: Because we have being asked and not told as Keir Starmer keep saying to the press
attributes.background: As we have being asked to contribute more in stealth tax to debate how tax payers that choose not to pay more how they can op out

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you're concerned about taxes. However, we're not exactly sure what specific changes you'd like to see. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

You may wish to sign these petitions:

Give people the option to opt out of income tax: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/737585

End the freeze on income tax thresholds & adjust annually, indexed to inflation: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/749467
